column4: you mean i386?  not much aiui.  a few things don't work w/ 64 iirc
I meant i386 :$ Yeah, I know that some stuff don't work very well under AMD64, that's why I wondered how much drawbacks there would be...
well judging by this: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=206405 ... there isn't really much of a compromise
